item.description:
Hello all,

OK all you Euro game players. Come play Shogun, only 5 people can play. It's a long and somewhat complicated euro game - not for the faint of heart. There are alot of moving parts and we are all in learning mode and need to focus. Bring your patience and your booze - I think you'll need both. :)

I'm not sure if I'll be cooking - maybe some sort of take out would be best - I'll try to have the game put together and setup prior to everyone arriving that will cut about 45mins off the top right there.

I look forward to playing. 

Parking logistics: Please park in the emergency lane or CVS parking lot. Please no parking in the front or side of my house.

 

Take care,

Margaret
item.why: Because we learn a new Euro game

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Shogun at Margaret's
